name: Fun With Dolls
description:
Fun With Dolls is a fun physics game where you have to  get a rag-doll from one part of the map to another,  only by using bounce pads and disappearing platforms.

Controls

D - Launch rag doll (Only at the start of the level)

R - Restart level

left click - spawns platform (If You have any left)

right click - spawns bounce pad (If you have any left)

Version 0.0.2

Added Levels 1-5 

More levels and Bug fixes coming soon .
